ValidationRule.description: APR0158877-Created as part of APR to enter Reason Lost field value set to price before selecting Total Discount Amount field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator')), OR($Profile.Name = 'MMS Sales - SB', $Profile.Name = 'MMS Manager - SB'), $RecordType.Name = 'MMS Opportunity Record Type', OR(ISPICKVAL( Reason_Not_Sold__c, 'Price'), ISPICKVAL( Reason_Not_Sold__c, 'Pricing')), ISPICKVAL( Total_Discount_Amount_needed_to_Win__c, '') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: MMS users are required to enter in a value into the 'Total Discount Amount needed to Win' field upon entering in 'Price' into the 'Reason Lost' field
